data.name: Waxworks: Curse of the Ancestors Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
THE ORIGIN: HORRORSOFT
Waxworks was released in 1992 by Horrorsoft on PC and Amiga with a 28 original music made by Jezz Woodroffe.
Creepy and well done 8bit music supported horror atmosphere for the entire game.


NEW SOUNDTRACK
The new Waxworks: Curse of the Ancestors is a remake of the predecessor and comes with a brand new high quality music.
Music is created by David Wurczel and Karel Antonin that are great orchestral composers.

This Soundtrack includes 22 music
